thumb.title: 栄光 Glory 【BGM】
thumb.description: この音楽は、聴く人を暗い秘密の世界へと誘う怪しいメロディーを展開します。心の奥に潜む不安や疑念がふと顔を出し、聴く人を謎めいた旅へと導いていきます。微妙に歪んだ音色が織り成す音景の中で、聴く人は未知の恐怖と魅惑の狭間を行き来する貴重な体験ができるでしょう。陰に潜む怪しげな雰囲気が全体を包み込み、聴く人の心に一生忘れられない印象を残す音楽体験が待っています！ This music develops a mysterious melody that leads the listener into a dark and secretive world. Anxieties and doubts lurking in the back of the mind suddenly come to the surface, leading the listener on an enigmatic journey. In the soundscape woven by subtly distorted tones, listeners will have the precious experience of moving back and forth between fear and fascination of the unknown. A mysterious atmosphere lurking in the shadows envelops the entire piece, creating a musical experience that will leave an unforgettable impression on the listener's mind for a lifetime! https://twitter.com/nojisuman2525 download https://nojimusic.base.shop https://www.motionelements.com/ja/artists/nojisuma https://patreon.com/NojiSuma?utm_medium=clipboard_copy&utm_source=copyLink&utm_campaign=creatorshare_creator&utm_content=join_link
